Discover
What are you looking for? Advanced Search Home > All Categories > Dining Out > Fast Food > Resolved Question In Him I Live.... Member since: July 14, 2007 Total points: 1,034 (Level 3) Add Contact Block
Resolved Question Show me another » What is the ghetto-est fast food restaurant in your area? I mean consistenly bad service. I live in Central Texas and have to say that Jack in the Box wins it hands down with Church's Chicken a close second. Service at Jack in the Box is soooooooo slooooooow! The people taking the order are just beyond ghetto and don't know what customer service is. 5 years ago Report Abuse by girlygur... Member since: January 24, 2008 Total points: 133 (Level 1) Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Asker my MCDONALDS man they be havin junkies , rap groups,mann even the works are puttin in weave in the back s/he thought nobody was lookin i saw it it was not even human hair. 5 years ago Report Abuse Asker's Rating: Asker's Comment: All of your answers were great. Nika1-I've always wondered about that about Church's and Popeyes-they pile up all of that chicken-how long does it take to just put it in a box?!
But Girly-seriously-putting weave on in the back-that takes the GHETTO CAKE! Unbelievable. Action Bar: 0 stars - mark this as Interesting! Email Comment ( 2 ) Save Add to My Yahoo! Add to Del.icio.us RSS
Toya S dude i wish, even a little ghetto would be nice i live in prim and propper beverly hills, rodeo drive area. Report Abuse Cole D In la there is dinos chicken and burgers. It opened 2 mnths ago and got robbed 8 times. Stallions chicken n grits got closed cause gang fights and over 3 deaths. The outside is coverd in crip taging and mor then 3f bullet holes Report Abuse
* You must be logged into Answers to add comments. Sign in or Register .
Other Answers (25) Show: All Answers Oldest to Newest Newest to Oldest Rated Highest to Lowest by sally123 Member since: January 14, 2008 Total points: 1,075 (Level 3) Add Contact Block Kentucky Fried Chicken. Chicken is consistently RAW. Customer service is severly lacking GHETTO Never have whats on the menu. 5 years ago Report Abuse
1 person rated this as good by Lesa D Member since: June 04, 2007 Total points: 222 (Level 1) Add Contact Block OMG..Popeye's for me gets it.hands down. They are so rude where I live...and just as ignorant. 5 years ago Report Abuse
1 person rated this as good by Sa_San Member since: December 31, 2006 Total points: 15,410 (Level 6) Add Contact Block The McDonald's close to where I live. One time I ordered, and it took literally 10 minutes to get my food. The girl who took my order completely forgot about me. At the same time, she was taking other customers and was giving them their orders, with extra food.
She was nice enough to apologize to me, and give me free fries. 5 years ago Report Abuse
2 people rated this as good by Rock N Roll Saved My Soul Member since: June 20, 2006 Total points: 4,726 (Level 4) Add Contact Block Taco Bells are all pretty good around here. Burger Kings aint to bad. McDonalds needs works... screwing up the order EVERY time.
The chicken places all suck! Churches, Popeyes &KFC. Bad Service, out of stuff...slow&rude.
I'm with ya on the JitB. We always have a problem with JitB 5 years ago Report Abuse by Minna V Member since: December 07, 2006 Total points: 8,120 (Level 5) Add Contact Block Sorry, don't eat fast food (well hardly ever) and don't live anywhere near ghetto areas. Worst service: Arby's, the one and only time I went the girl at the counter could barely understand English. 5 years ago Report Abuse by Yin Member since: January 20, 2006 Total points: 2,277 (Level 3) Add Contact Block Ghettoist -Polo Loco Best-In-N-Out Burger 5 years ago Report Abuse by richietc... Member since: March 29, 2006 Total points: 14,876 (Level 6) Add Contact Block The Louisiana Fried Chicken/Chinese food restaurant. It's just attended by ghetto people. LOL 5 years ago Report Abuse
1 person rated this as good by toucansa... Member since: April 11, 2006 Total points: 845 (Level 2) Add Contact Block The Wendy's in my area seems to like to hire a lot of parolees and halfway house people. They have to be, I go there all the time and the ghetto gangbanger crew changes monthly. I work at another quick service kind of place, and our turnover is low and we hire good people. I live in Michigan, so we have our pick of the litter. I even had to give one of the bangers a box of Captain Crunch, I felt so sorry for him. 5 years ago Report Abuse by emcee 3 Member since: July 23, 2007 Total points: 241 (Level 1) Add Contact Block md's 5 years ago Report Abuse by Secret Asian Man Member since: July 16, 2007 Total points: 5,338 (Level 5) Add Contact Block the chinese carry out place with bullet proof glass in front of the cashier.
also kennedy fried chicken http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kennedy_Fri… 5 years ago Report Abuse by davey8 Member since: July 13, 2007 Total points: 232 (Level 1) Add Contact Block A KFC a few blocks where I live its horrible the employees barely understand english! rofl. But the chicken is great because they make you wait for a long time and starve therefore you"ll be forced to say the chicken is delicious. 5 years ago Report Abuse by Miss J Member since: October 27, 2007 Total points: 375 (Level 2) Add Contact Block I agree with Jack in the Box. Service was so bad, the one in my area is closed down. I could name a few others, especially since I live in the south, so everything, especially it seems like people doing their jobs, is sooooo sloooow! 5 years ago Report Abuse
1 person rated this as good by chicken2... Member since: February 24, 2007 Total points: 8,362 (Level 5) Add Contact Block Our McDonald's downtown. The people that work there are very ghetto. I don't even bother going there anymore. They also work like turtles. 5 years ago Report Abuse
1 person rated this as good by jenjen Member since: January 01, 2008 Total points: 980 (Level 2) Add Contact Block we have mexican restaurants that serve food from a mobile trailer. You cant even order and know for sure what your getting. I have orderd one and it was good, but it was REALLY ghetto. This is in des moines iowa 5 years ago Report Abuse
1 person rated this as good by MrKnowIt... Member since: December 31, 2006 Total points: 13,750 (Level 6) Add Contact Block Yeah unfortunately Church's Chicken bites the big one here in Florida as well. Up in New York they are about one of the best to go to, but not down here. Totally different attitude down here. 5 years ago Report Abuse
1 person rated this as good by wade_leo... Member since: July 01, 2006 Total points: 257 (Level 2) Add Contact Block Man i agree, churches chicken is my ghetto resturaunt, there are people walking in who look like their high or on dope 5 years ago Report Abuse by nika1 Member since: November 05, 2007 Total points: 1,538 (Level 3) Add Contact Block popeyes chicken. i never could understand how they keep mounds and mounds of chicken ready,but yet you still have to wait twenty minutes for your chicken! 5 years ago Report Abuse by deirdrez... Member since: November 17, 2006 Total points: 13,249 (Level 6) Add Contact Block Mo'Meaty Burgers 5 years ago Report Abuse
1 person rated this as good by dancinin... Member since: December 03, 2007 Total points: 4,212 (Level 4) Add Contact Block Ya, I'd have to agree with Jack in the Box, I live in DFW area. We don't have one in my suburb, but the ones I've visited nearby have had bad service and mess up the orders. 5 years ago Report Abuse
1 person rated this as good by 12/10 ♥ JUST MARRIED! ♥ Member since: October 14, 2007 Total points: 239 (Level 1) Add Contact Block hahaha.... i think it depends on how busy they are.. sometimes.. well this ONE time .. i went to white castle and the lady has my shake in her hand with the window open and flirtin with some guy.. i was like ab to grab it out of her hand...HAHAHAHH too fun 5 years ago Report Abuse by Xerandia... Member since: November 19, 2007 Total points: 3,339 (Level 4) Add Contact Block The fast food place with the worst customer service in my community is Taco Bell. Most other Taco Bells I have been to are really good and fast, but not this one. 5 years ago Report Abuse
1 person rated this as good by David H. Member since: August 07, 2007 Total points: 7,597 (Level 5) Add Contact Block I don't know, but the place I saw in the movie"Dont Be A Menace to South Central While Drinkin'Your Juice In Da Hood", there was a place called"Chicken and Oil Change"--THAT had to have been the"ghetto-ist"eating establishment that I had ever seen! 5 years ago Report Abuse by Jeremy B Member since: January 01, 2008 Total points: 1,852 (Level 3) Add Contact Block They usually have most of the same fast food restaurant in the ghetto as in other working class neighborhoods. 5 years ago Report Abuse
1 person rated this as good by Foxi173 Member since: March 19, 2007 Total points: 117 (Level 1) Add Contact Block Taco Bell close to my house but the rest of them in town are pretty good.They are very slow&are not too accurate in giving you what you order. 5 years ago Report Abuse by Tiffany Member since: November 01, 2007 Total points: 3,190 (Level 4) Add Contact Block I have the worst McDonald's next to my house... you could definitely use the word GHETTO when describing this place! 5 years ago Report Abuse
